text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that the truck driver's actions will likely be deemed at least negligent because the chair was not properly secured. Furthermore, the analysis of D2's liability hinges on the initial negligent act of the unsecured load, even if legal causation for the serious injury fails due to the intervening drunk driver.
